Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Abo baye bala ukukholwa, bathintela (abantu) eNdleleni ka- Allâh. Kubo Siya kongezelela isohlwayo kuba babesasaza ukungcola

Ke kaloku ngaloo Mini Siya kuvelisa iNgqina kwisizwe ngasinye (eliya kunika) ubungqina ngokuchasene nabo. Size Sivelise wena (Muhammad) ukuba ube liNgqina ngokuchasene naba (Bantu). Ukanti Sithumele iNcwadi (i’Kur’ân) kuwe ukuba ibe ngumcacisi wezinto zonke, ibe sisikhokelo, ibe yinceba neendaba ezivuyisayo kwabo bazinikeleyo, (kuAllâh bangamaMuslim)

Inene uAllâh Uyalela ukwenziwa kobulungisa nokuhle nokunikela kwizizalwana8 nezihlobo. Nokwalela ukwenziwa kokungcola nobutshinga nayo yonke ingcinezelo. Uniyalela kananjalo ukuba nithabathe ingqalelo
Ke kaloku zalisekisani iminqophiso xa nithe nanqophisa, ningazaphuli izifungo emva kokuba sele nizimisele, nibeke uAllâh ukuba Abe sisimiso senu. Inene uAllâh Uyakwazi enikwenzayo

Kananjalo ningabi nje ngomfazi okhulula umsonto asele ewolukile emveni kokuba ubusele uqinile, ngokuthabatha izifungo zenu zibe yindlela yokukhohlisa phakathi kwenu, kuba hleze uhlanga oluthile lube luninzi kakhulu kunolunye uhlanga. UAllâh Uyanivavanya kuphela ngako oku. Ukanti ngoMhla wovuko Uza kunenza nicacelwe koko naningavumelani ngako

Yaye ukuba uAllâh Ebethanda, Ebenganenza nibe luhlanga olunye (nonke) kodwa Yena Uthumela ekulahlekeni lowo Athande ukumthumela, Akhokelele lowo Athande ukumkhokelela kodwa ngokuqinisekileyo niza kubuzwa ngoko nakwenzayo
